attributes.action: Only let immigrants who can pass a basic english test into to the country
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: This is a petition to try and limit the huge number of immigrants that flood into the country every year. These people are not productive members of the econemy until they can get a job, which in most cases is only when they can speak english. Many other countries have tests immigrants must take before they enter the country most of these tests incluse a basics in the native language. This petition is to stopthe economic drain legal immigrants can be when they can't spaek our language therefore can't get a job, therefore are living off benefits. this act would also stop the rare cases in which immigrants will come to our country purposly to live of our generosity. This will not affect asylum seekers or those who will not stay in our country more than 6 months.

rejection.details: There is a similar petition at http://petitions.pm.gov.uk/languagebarrier/
reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
